LanguageData.CryptoSleepBlockCrash:
A cryptosleep block of the ship is crashing nearby.

All of its inhabitants will likely be severely injured or killed upon impact.

This event will center on a presumed falling location. The ship parts will be falling from north.
LanguageData.SimpleShipPartCrash: A large chunk of the ship is crashing nearby.\n\nThis event will center on a presumed falling location. The ship parts will be falling from north.
LanguageData.FoodCargoContainerCrash:
A cargo container with food is crashing nearby.

There is a high probability that all of this food will be consumed by the fire after impact.

This event will center on a presumed falling location. The ship parts will be falling from north.
LanguageData.ResourcesCargoContainerCrash: A cargo container with resources is crashing nearby.\n\nThis event will center on a presumed falling location. The ship parts will be falling from north.
LanguageData.MedicineCargoContainerCrash: A cargo container with medicine is crashing nearby.\n\nThis event will center on a presumed falling location. The ship parts will be falling from north.
LanguageData.ArtCargoContainerCrash: An art gallery ship block is crashing nearby.\n\nThis event will center on a presumed falling location. The ship parts will be falling from north.
LanguageData.ApparelCargoContainerCrash: A cargo container with various apparel is crashing nearby.\n\nThis event will center on a presumed falling location. The ship parts will be falling from north.
LanguageData.MixedCargoContainerCrash: A cargo container with mixed trade goods is crashing nearby.\n\nThis event will center on a presumed falling location. The ship parts will be falling from north.
LanguageData.WeaponSafeCrash:
A weapon deck with various weapons and ammo is crashing nearby.

Be careful as unexploded ordnance can be very dangerous.

This event will center on a presumed falling location. The ship parts will be falling from north.
LanguageData.ShipEngineCrash:
One of the ship's engines is crashing nearby.

Watch out for debris!

This event will center on a presumed falling location. The ship parts will be falling from north.
LanguageData.ShipReactorCrash:
A ship's reactor is crashing nearby. Stay as far away as possible from the crash site!

Damaged reactors are extremely dangerous due to radiation leaks.

This event will center on a presumed falling location. The ship parts will be falling from north.
LanguageData.ShipAICoreCrash:
The main ship computer core is crashing nearby.

This is a very valuable ship part but not for those who need food, medicine or more doctors.

This event will center on a presumed falling location. The ship parts will be falling from north.
LanguageData.AnimalPensCrash:
A pod containing various animals is crashing nearby.

Unfortunately most of them will die upon impact.

This event will center on a presumed falling location. The ship parts will be falling from north.
LanguageData.AnimalPensDomesticCrash:
A pod containing various domestic animals is crashing nearby.

Unfortunately most of them will die upon impact.

This event will center on a presumed falling location. The ship parts will be falling from north.
LanguageData.PrisonBlockCrash:
A prison block with angry prisoners is crashing nearby.

Some of these prisoners managed to obtain weapons during the accident. Hopefully not all of them will survive the impact.

This event will center on a presumed falling location. The ship parts will be falling from north.
LanguageData.ProductionModuleCrash:
A production module is crashing nearby.

It contains a lot of metal.

This event will center on a presumed falling location. The ship parts will be falling from north.
LanguageData.NutrientDispenserCrash:
A Nutrient dispenser is crashing nearby.

It contains a lot of valuable nutrient paste.

This event will center on a presumed falling location. The ship parts will be falling from north.
LanguageData.BatteriesModuleCrash:
A Batteries module is crashing nearby.

Any functional batteries remaining will store energy.

This event will center on a presumed falling location. The ship parts will be falling from north.
LanguageData.Main_BigShipCrash: The remains of a large space ship are crashing nearby. Beware the direct impact sites of falling parts but be ready to collect resources, rescue survivors and beat the fires.
LanguageData.EventRandomShipCrash: The remains of an unknown space ship are crashing nearby. Beware the direct impact sites of falling parts but be ready to collect resources, rescue survivors and beat the fires.
LanguageData.Main_BigShipCrash_Ends: The last part of the ship has fallen to the ground.
LanguageData.CommandAddDangerZoneDesc: Creates an area outside reactor's danger radius.
